FINISH WIZARD SCHOOL, HANK

EMMA JANE PHILIPS, ONE OF YOUR UNFORTUNATE BACKERS HAD THIS TO SAY ON THE CAMPAIGN, THREE DAYS AGO:

No expansion. No care package. No surprise.

And no word from any of the folks involved in this sad, sorry mess as to what the heck is happening now.

Pretty sure I went in and tried to switch to the "please give me my money back" option rather than wait for the arrival of the two copies of the expansion I ordered oh-so-long-ago, but there's no sign of that either.

The only upside to being a backer of this sh!t-show is that it provides a wonderfully calming perspective for all the projects I've backed since, eg: what's that? the project has hit a snag but you're staying in touch with us on a monthly basis and it will only be a few months delayed? Not. A. Problem. It's not like it's going to be YEARS without anything resembling reasonable contact and an apparently unending wait for ... oh... wow... has anyone else considered that this is some weird Kickstarter version of 'Waiting for Godot'?
